category.name: Product Structure.RDV
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDVArchMaxNVEsAllowed
preference.preference_description: Indicates the maximum number of Named Variant Expressions to be displayed in the form of XO chart (wherein the contents of the Named Variant Expression are represented by 'X's and 'O's in tabular form) without user confirmation.
